snippet.title: BEYOND: Two Souls™ E3 First Look
snippet.description:
Take a look at the first scene from BEYOND: Two Souls ™, the latest project from the makers of Heavy Rain™! 

BEYOND: Two Souls (tm) is a unique psychological action thriller featuring Academy Award(r) nominee, Ellen Page in the lead role.  Experience the incredible life of a person who possesses extraordinary powers through a connection with an invisible entity.  Watch as your actions and decisions determine her fate and face incredible emotional challenges never before seen in a video game.

Visit www.BEYONDPS3.com

Rated Mature: Blood, Intense Violence, Sexual Content, Strong Language, and Use of Drugs and Alcohol

©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe.  Beyond: Two Souls is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Developed by Quantic Dream.
